name: Solmec: Colony Adrift
description:
Solmec: Colony Adrift is a turn-based tactical RPG and the first game in the chronology of the Solmec trilogy. Taken from their dying world, the remains of a civilization must now seek refuge on the back of the Ankazil: colossal space-faring beasts.

-Lead a party of up to 6 warriors across a procedurally-generated overworld
-Confront the Rot with 3 distinct unit types in turn-based tactical combat
-Interact with other inhabitants and mysterious ruins through narrative encounters
-Gather 5 resources to increase statistics, upgrade weapons and unlock rituals
-Cleanse the Ankazil of the Rot to make it safe for the Solmec people!
